name: R. Rodrey Howell
content: Home page for Rod Howell Rodney R. Howell Kansas State University Associate Professor Undergraduate Programs Director Department of Computer Science 2184 Engineering Hall 1701D Platt St. Manhattan, KS 66506 (785) 532-7735 Resume Algorithms Textbook I'm currently not active in research, but in the past I've worked on real-time scheduling theory, self-stabilizing systems, Petri nets, and computational complexity. Please see my resume for a complete list of my publications. I have also written a textbook, Algorithms: A Top-Down Approach, published by World Scientific. I've been one of the organizers of the KSU High School Programming Contest since its inception in 1992. Away from work, I'm heavily involved with the Manhattan Church of Christ. As a part of my church work, I'm the faculty adviser for Cats for Christ. Rod Howell (rhowell@ksu.edu)
